tutorial.speak:
To add hosts for your live stream, start from the Dashboard and click on Settings in the left navigation menu.
From the Settings page, click on the Roles button in the top navigation to access role management.
On the Roles page, click the plus button in the top right corner and select Add Custom Role from the dropdown menu.
In the Role Name field, enter Streaming Host and click Save to create the new role.
Your new Streaming Host role will now appear in the roles list.
Click on the Streaming Host role to edit it. You'll see the Members section where you can add people to this role.
Click the Add button in the Members section, search for the person you want to add as a host, and click Select next to their name.
The person you selected will now appear in the Members list for this role.
Now scroll down to Edit Permissions and expand the Content section. Check the Host Chat permission to give this role the ability to moderate chat and respond to prayer requests.
When your host logs into the live stream page, they will have special host capabilities including the ability to moderate the chat and respond to prayer requests.
